enhanced_rules.name: Sudden Duration Spike
enhanced_rules.explanation: The duration of a test case increased suddenly by more than twice the standard deviation
enhanced_rules.remediation: Investigate the test case for potential bottlenecks or inefficiencies

enhanced_rules.name: High Duration Test Case
enhanced_rules.explanation: The duration of a test case is more than two standard deviations above the mean
enhanced_rules.remediation: Review the test case to identify potential areas for optimization

enhanced_rules.name: Low Duration Test Case
enhanced_rules.explanation: The duration of a test case is more than two standard deviations below the mean
enhanced_rules.remediation: This might be an indication of a test case that is not comprehensive enough. Review the test case to ensure it covers all necessary aspects

enhanced_rules.name: High Frequency of Test Case Execution
enhanced_rules.explanation: A test case is being executed more frequently than two standard deviations above the mean
enhanced_rules.remediation: Review the test case execution schedule to ensure it is not being run unnecessarily frequently
